snippet: As the president prepares for his re-election effort, he must carry out both official duties and campaign objectives; his travel schedule in the coming days addresses both at the same time.
abstract: As the president prepares for his re-election effort, he must carry out both official duties and campaign objectives; his travel schedule in the coming days addresses both at the same time.

headline.main: Obama a Frequent Flier to 2012 Swing States
headline.print_headline: Obama a Frequent Flier To 2012 Swing States
